sentences.en: "Gimme a break, kid! You know how much those things cost?"
sentences.cn: “饶了我吧，小祖宗！你知道这些东西有多贵吗？”

sentences.en: A neighbor volunteered to keep an eye on the kids (= their children or the children they are responsible for ).
sentences.cn: 一位邻居主动来照看这些小孩。

sentences.en: a poor kid growing up in the ghetto
sentences.cn: 在贫民区长大的穷孩子

sentences.en: all this was kids' stuff though compared to the directing.
sentences.cn: 可是同指挥比较起来这都是小儿科。

sentences.en: Carlotta’s 39? No kidding?
sentences.cn: 卡洛塔39岁了？不是开玩笑吧？

sentences.en: college kids
sentences.cn: 大学生

sentences.en: come here, our kid.
sentences.cn: 小弟弟，过来。

sentences.en: He beat up on my brother's kid one time.
sentences.cn: 他有一次殴打了我哥的孩子。

sentences.en: He liked to kid Ingrid a lot.
sentences.cn: 他很喜欢捉弄英格丽德。

sentences.en: He told us to get stuffed so we leaned on his kid.
sentences.cn: 他叫我们滚蛋，于是我们威胁他的孩子。

sentences.en: He's like some dreamy kid playing on his own.
sentences.cn: 他就像是个自娱自乐的爱幻想的孩子。

sentences.en: He’s married with three kids.
sentences.cn: 他已婚，有三个孩子。

sentences.en: His son was a junkie, the kid OD'd a year ago.
sentences.cn: 他儿子是个吸毒者，这孩子一年前吸食了过量毒品。

sentences.en: It's lousy to be the new kid.
sentences.cn: 作为新人的滋味总是不大好受。

sentences.en: My kid sister woke up and started crying.
sentences.cn: 我妹妹醒了，哭了起来。

sentences.en: no kidding, she's gone.
sentences.cn: 说真的，她走了。

sentences.en: She says the kid's been squirrelling money away like there's no tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 她说这孩子一直在拼命存钱。

sentences.en: She’d always loved animals since she was a little kid.
sentences.cn: 她从小就喜爱动物。

sentences.en: Some artists have to be handled with kid gloves.
sentences.cn: 和有些艺术家打交道时要谨慎。

sentences.en: The soldiers bantered with him as though he was a kid brother.
sentences.cn: 士兵们把他当作弟弟一样和他开着玩笑。

sentences.en: We're kidding ourselves, Bill. We're not winning, we're not even doing well.
sentences.cn: 我们是在欺骗自己，比尔。我们不会赢的。我们做得甚至都不好

sentences.en: You can hardly expect scintillating conversation from a kid that age.
sentences.cn: 你几乎想不到那么点儿的孩子会说出妙趣横生的话来。

sentences.en: You take care of your end, kid, I'll take care of mine.
sentences.cn: 你管好你的事，孩子，我会管好我的。

sentences.en: You're a bright enough kid, I'll give you that.
sentences.cn: 我得承认，你是个挺聪明的孩子。

phrases.phrase: handle (或 treat) someone or something with kid glo
phrases.tran_cn: 审慎周到（或机智巧妙）地待人处事
(非正式)稚气（或天真）的事情；小儿科
（用以强调陈述的真实性）不开玩笑，说真的
(英，非正式)小弟弟，小妹妹（常用作称谓）

trans.tran_cn: 较年幼的，小山羊皮制的
<口>小孩，小山羊，小山羊皮制品

trans.tran_en: to say something that is not true, especially as a joke
